name: inestimably
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is extremely great, or too great to be described or expressed exactly: The ability to sense an emerging trend is an inestimably valuable gift. The archive was an inestimably important addition to the library’s collections. See
inestimable
More examplesFewer examplesUS household savings were effectively offset by inestimably larger financial liabilities.It is an inestimably cerebral, endlessly complicated, and occasionally incomprehensible show. She had inestimably high cheekbones.
